column1: '''''Arda Philology 1''''' is the first volume of the journal ''[[Arda (annual)
column2: Arda Philology]]'', and contains the proceedings of the First International Conference on Tolkien's Invented Languages, ''[[Omentielva
column3: Omentielva Minya]]'', which was held in Stockholm in August [[2005]].

column1: * [[Nils-Lennart Johannesson]]: "Quenya, the Black Speech and the Sonority Scale"
* [[Magnus Åberg]]: "An Analysis of Dwarvish", with an appended Khuzdul glossary
* [[Bertrand Bellet]]: "Vowel Affection in Sindarin and Noldorin"
* [[Christopher Gilson]]: "'Namárië' and the Lexicon of Quenya"
